channel.title: DHRUV SADHU on Dhruv Sadhu
channel.description: Recent content in DHRUV SADHU on Dhruv Sadhu

item.title: Employment
item.description: UWharrie Consulting UWharrie Consulting is a consulting company that provides data and services to political campaigns. Consultant Director (January 2020 - Present) Responsible for hiring, training, and managing consultants that serve as pollsters for political campaigns hired by the firm. Also responsible for speaking directly with voters (phonebanking, canvasing, etc). Eye Level of High Point “Eye Level” is an education company, similar to “Sylvan” or “Mathnasium” or “Kumon”, that specializes in supplementary learning programs.

item.title: Experience
item.description: UNC Charlotte – Student Government Association Student Senator, Chairman of Student Affairs As a senator, I’ve had the priveledge of striving to better my self as a leader whilst working with students, professors, and administrators toward a greater good. This position has offered delightful insight into the nature of bureaucracy, the dilemmas of business administration, and the spirit of advocacy. Being elected to these positions has been an honor. Responsibilities Include…
